content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for coming to see my apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, and I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I must emphasize that I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to negotiate the price to reflect the value of the apartment. What rental price are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to offer 350 Euros per month. Is this reasonable?

I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate the rental price if it is reasonable. I am not looking to pay more than what I can afford.

I would like to ask if there are any additional costs that I should be aware of, such as utilities or any other fees.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. While 350 Euros per month is certainly reasonable for a 25 square meter apartment, I would like to explore the possibility of a higher rental price. However, I do understand that you are on a tight budget, and I am willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial solution.

As for additional costs, I would like to clarify that the rental price I am asking for includes all utilities and other fees associated with the apartment. However, please keep in mind that you will be responsible for paying any additional costs that may arise, such as internet or phone bills.

I would be happy to discuss this further with you and explore different rental price options. Is there a specific price range that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am comfortable with a rental price of 400 Euros per month. However, if you are not willing to accept this offer, I will have to look for another apartment.

I understand that you want to maximize your gains, but I am willing to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial solution. I am not looking to pay more than what I can afford.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Nesibe. While I understand your desire to find a mutually beneficial solution, I must emphasize that my goal as a landlord is to maximize my gains. Therefore, I am not able to accept your offer of 400 Euros per month for the apartment.

That being said, I am willing to work with you to find a rental price that is reasonable and affordable for both of us. I would like to suggest that we explore the possibility of a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This price reflects the value of the apartment and would provide me with a reasonable return on my investment.

I understand that this may be out of your budget, but I would like to emphasize that this rental price includes all utilities and other fees associated with the apartment. Additionally, by renting this apartment, you will have access to a prime location in the heart of the city, which may be of value to you in the long run.

I hope that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
